commit message:
- worked on memory optimizations for mapsforge map view
- allows to run on devices with 24 and 20MB java process memory size

- updated mapsforge jar

edit activated, share icons in actionbar for G+ presentation
basig share for POI
new launcher icons
new icons according design recomendations

- first version of login capability
- as login atm uses staging, detail edits need to use staging as well
- open question: shall wheelchair state changes use also the personal login, if available?
